name: EZ Livin
description:
Jump through randomly generated spikey levels, and obtain enough money to grow the plant of your dreams!

Controls:

  • MOVE: W/A or left/right arrows
  • JUMP: spacebar
  • INTERACT: S or down arrow
  • CLIMB: hold towards a wall and press up or down, tap down to let go early

Press "M" to mute or unmute sounds.

Game Guide:

Level Objects:

  • Up arrow - Grants one double jump, indicated by a blue aura
  • Upside down T - Grants one second chance, checkpoints are only dropped when you jump. Indicated by a trail of objects
  • Coins - grants one coin, use in the shop or the well.
  • Well - Interact to lose all of your coins. Each coin lost will appear twice in the next level

Shop Objects:

  • Statue in Spike Room  - pay to reset spike wall
  • Altar - pay to receive a random pickup
  • Plant - plant

Created for Eggplant Community Game Jam #5 - "Making Generous Games"

Notes:

  • Jumping/double jumping/wall jumping has some weirdness right now. An unintentional super jump can be achieved by running at a wall and jumping as you bump into it.
  • There is at least one spot where a spike can spawn over the exit door.
  • No music right now, ran out of time :(
  • Font is Express Mono by Chevy Ray
  • Web version has delayed sfx for some reaons. I am not sure how to fix.
